author: Mister-Kay
description: Apply a visual effect on party members that have mystic auras when playing as mystic or manually enabled.

description: Timestamps in chat, if you want to disable timestamping in some particular tab - add "!" to it's name.

description: Bored? Global chat useless again? This module for you!

author: Leyki / TerableCoder
description: Let's you broadly customize whisper messages with a color of choice and based on different settings of whose whispers must be targeted and whose shouldn't.

name: Cosplayer

description: Changes your client-side appearance. Free costumes, mounts, weapon skins and much more!

name: party_death_marker_pointers
author: Owyn
description: Spawns colored pointy arrows on top of dead party members

author: Caali / YunfeiG
description: Guide module for Demon's Wheel

name: dressupyourfriends
author: Seren
description: Something that should be deleted already. Allows you to change others costumes.

name: EP-Tracker

description: A tera-proxy module that shows you information about your Enhancement Points experience, including the daily softcap.

name: Essentials
author: Pinkie Pie / Caali / TeraProxy
description: A tera-proxy module that automatically uses Nostrum/Battle Solution and Complete Crystalbind items whenever needed.

name: flasher
author: Caali
description: Flashes your client (like when receiving a negotiation request) to notify you of certain events (for example instance matching completed).

name: fps-booster-2000
description: Boosts your fps by blocking unneeded packets. WARNING: you will not be able to see purple health bars

name: fps-utils
author: Pentagon
description: Hides other players and skill effects to significantly boost your framerate

name: generic-box-opener-item-user
author: Owyn
description: Mass-Opens boxes

name: GG-Reset
author: Snug
description: Automaticly resets ghillie once entering Velik's Sanctuary

name: gld-guide
author: valkyr1e
description: Guide of Grotto of Lost Souls

name: Elin Matching Ears and Tail
description: Matches the ears and tail with the selected hair color
author: Snug

options.guiName: Hair: Elin Matching Ears and Tail

name: HH Fire Markers
author: Fruit
description: Spawn signs on the safe spots in HarrowHold phase 4.

name: HH-Firewall-SafeSpot-Markers
author: Owyn
description: Places shiny ore items on safespots for HH P4

name: hide-dmg
author: Fruit
description: Hides those annoying damage numbers.

name: improved-lfg
author: ayylmar
description: [Temporarily disabled due to a bug] Improves the LFG window by adding handy filters to it and the ability to only display raids.

name: infinity-journal
author: ayylmar
description: Use the Travel Journal to store potentially infinite locations shared across characters and servers with an optional and easy to use ingame web interface to quickly find that one perfect ERP spot you saved.

name: Inspector
author: TeraProxy
description: Automatically inspects players when they apply for your group and logs details about them in your console and ingame chat. Hides the inspect window during combat so you don't get distracted while fighting.

name: instant-everything
author: Caali / Pinkie Pie / m0py / Snug / beng
description: Removes the annoying animation and skips the progress bar for enchanting, upgrading, soulbinding, dismantling, and merging items.

name: Item Cache
author: Pinkie Pie / (forked by HakuryuuDom)
description: Reduces bandwidth usage and speeds up opening inventory and bank tabs.

name: mongord
author: Fruit
description: Searchs on moongourd for the inspected character.

name: monster-marker
author: Seren
description: Marks out user-specified monsters, world bosses and special event monsters. Version 4.3.0: NA santa and bluebox event

name: Mount-Prediction
author: Snug
description: Removes ping tax related to mounts

author: seraphinush | TeraProxy
description: tera-proxy module to notify enrage information of bosses
name: msg-enrage
Nest-Guide
author: Owyn
description: Parquina's Nest guide for last boss

name: No Drunk Screen
author: Pentagon
description: Hides vomit inducing effects

name: no-more-death-animations
author: ayylmar
description: Removes dying monsters to save you from the useless particle explosions.

name: no_more_guardian
author: Owyn
description: Disables guardian auto-optimization along with its UI

name: no-more-trash-lootbeams
author: Owyn
description: Disables lootbeams over outdated useless trash items

name: no-custom-loadingscreens
description: Disable custom loading screens supplied by the game's publishers and instead show only default ones.
author: Caali

name: no-more-crazy-capes
author: Mister-Kay
description: Fixes cape exploding physics glitch by re-equipping back items of other players 3 seconds after they load/change equipment.

name: No-More-Motes
author: Snug
description: Disables the spawning of iod hp/mp motes to help on fps when mass farming iod

name: no-more-noctenium-lag
author: Mister-Kay
description: Blocks packets which caused client lag when using Noctenium.

name: no-more-wasted-backstabs
author: Mister-Kay
description: Blocks targeted teleport skills without a target.

name: no-more-annoying-titles
author: SaltyMonkey
description: Removing shiny titles from another players

name: Normalifier
author: spaacecats / TeraProxy
description: Blocks specific abnormals in order to not trigger annoying screen effects on your client (e.g. Lein's Dark Root Beer).

name: ping-compensation
author: Mister-Kay
description: Gives you fake attack speed to eliminate ping tax between skills.

name: quick-load
author: HakuryuuDom / Pinkie Pie
description: Bypasses loadscreens when switching channels or teleporting within the same zone.

name: Rainbow
author: Pentagon
description: Makes ur char go rainbow

name: rk9guide
author: Owyn
description: Guide for RK9 dungeon

name: Rootbeer
author: Pinkie Pie / (forked by HakuryuuDom)
description: Automatically opens Bamarama Boxes and deletes unwanted items.

name: Salt-Remover
author: SaltyMonkey
description: Removing useless messages from your screen caused by salt-events

name: server-exposer
author: SaltyMonkey
description: Placing server name near guild name in dungeons/everywhere based on settings.

author: Kasea
name: tera-settings-saver
description: Saves your settings

name: shaker
author: Caali
description: Modify or completely disable camera shaking effects. You can configure it in the window that opens when typing `/proxy shaker` in chat.

name: show_hp_etchings
author: Owyn
description: Makes you able to discern etching which also give +HP stat

name: skill-prediction
author: Pinkie Pie / many others
description: Simulates skills client-side, eliminating ping-based delays and animation lock.

name: skill-resets
author: Caali / eemj
description: Pops up an on-screen message whenever a skill's cooldown is reset.

name: Socialize
author: Leyki
description: A general usage emote script and some more stuff.

name: stop-dismount
author: Seren
description: Fixes the dismounting bug during UHTF.

name: Talents-Info
author: Owyn
description: Shows EP EXP gains and your daily cap (89% of it)

name: tcc-stub

description: Proxy interface which allows TCC to actively interact with game.

name: Teabagger

description: A tera-proxy module that lets you teabag people. Why bm?

name: tera-guide
author: Kasea
description: Guides you in Tera

name: Translate
author: HakuryuuDom / teralove
description: Translates incoming and outgoing messages to another language using Google Translate.

name: true-everful-nostrum
author: Caali / Pinkie Pie
description: Ensures that your Elite/Tera Club Everful Nostrum/Noctenium is up 100% of the time. Complete rewrite of Pinkie Pie's original mod.

name: Tuwanguide

description: Calls out the colors for the Tuwangi minigame/guardian mission in proxy chat to make things a lot easier

name: Cute-Crafter-Icons
